login_step1: 1. Open Google AI Studio in Chrome/Edge (NOT Firefox) and sign in.
login_step2:
2. IMPORTANT: Use Chrome/Edge to get cookies.
Open DevTools (F12) -> Network.
Reload page -> Click "new_chat" request.
Headers -> Request Headers.
Copy the ENTIRE "Cookie" value.
login_rejected_tooltip: Login Rejected? Click here to use External Login!
reset_app_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the app? This will clear all data and restart.
star_repo: If you found it useful, give our repo a star please! â­
about_desc: An electron-based desktop wrapper for Google AI Studio.
account_index_help: Check browser URL: .../u/1/... -> Index is 1. Default is 0.
delete_profile_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete profile "{0}"? This action cannot be undone.
